name: Bubble Kingdom Story
description:
Bubble Kingdom Story!!!
Storm the castle walls in this bubble epic adventure. Join the kingdom’s court and match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the combination. Become part of the mythical adventure, and unlock awesome boosters that will help you get through levels. Plan ahead! Form a strategy to clear all the bubbles and pop your way up to victory.
How to Play
* Drag your finger to move the laser sight.
* Release your finger to shoot bubbles.
* Match 3 or more bubble of the same color to pop the combo and win points.
* Pop all the bubbles and solve the puzzles.
